data.title: FIFA sponsor Adidas joins Sony in voicing concerns about Qatar’s winning bid for the 2022 World Cup
Fifa sponsor demands 'appropriate investigation': One of Fifa's main sponsors, Sony, calls for an investigation into the decision to award the 2022 World Cup to Qatar

Russia warns Finland against joining NATO. 'If Finland wants to join NATO, they should think first. Will you join and start World War III?' warns Russian President Vladimir Putin's personal envoy Sergei Markov.

Gunmen attack Karachi international airport, injuring security guards and hurling grenades
Ganja finally to be legalized in Jamaica
Qatar allegedly paid $1.7 million to secure Asian votes for their World Cup bid
An outbreak of Ebola virus disease is happening in West Africa with 395 cases, 215 deaths and a case fatality of 54% as today
MH370 family members suspect coverup. Raise money for whistleblowers to come forward.
